synopsis.text: Whatâ€™s it like to have your heart play a game of soccer? Meet Azusa Kawahara, the dedicated manager of her high school's soccer team, who finds herself navigating the thrilling and challenging world of young love. Azusa's affection for her childhood friend and team member, Ikumi, is mutual and well-known throughout the school. However, their relationship is put to the test when rivals emerge, seeking to drive a wedge between them. To add to Azusa's unease, Ikumi's recent after-school commitments leave her feeling sidelined. As Azusa grapples with these challenges, she witnesses Ikumi walking home with another girl, Sayaka. Will Azusa's love for Ikumi withstand these trials, or will she be left watching from the sidelines as her heart takes a tumble? Join Azusa on this emotional rollercoaster ride in "Ano Ko ni 1000%."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
